segments.text: Oh dear , I ’ m late . I have to be in the office by 8am .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well there is an important meeting with a new client .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok but you must stay calm . Do you want me to give you a lift ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you don ’ t have to do that but it would be a great help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , wait one minute . I must remember where I left the keys .
segments.speaker: S2
